synopsis.text: Whether it's the unexpected connection between the sociable Hori and the brooding Miyamura, or the nostalgic reminiscence of their high school days, this anime offers a delightful blend of romance and youthful memories. As the graduation ceremony at Katagiri High School concludes, Hori, Miyamura, and their friends find themselves reflecting on their shared experiences. These moments, though transient, form a vibrant tapestry of their cherished memories. This new adaptation brings to life previously untold side stories, offering a fresh perspective on the characters' relationships. From class trips to Kyoto to amusing swimming mishaps, the high school students' lives are anything but dull. Join Hori, Miyamura, and their friends as they navigate the joyous, bittersweet journey of adolescence.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
